title: Kled Voice Reference? Movie "The Jerk" 1979
body:
[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QsCTnM9m5eM&t=7m45s](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QsCTnM9m5eM&t=7m45s)

Would this short line at 7:45 be a reference to Steve Martin in The Jerk?

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rSWBuZws30g

replies.body: Yep!   Well spotted.   Now you got only 29 more pop culture refences to find.

> [{quoted}](name=WAAARGHbobo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KGFVnJeu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-26T03:45:27.271+0000)
>
> Yep!   Well spotted.   Now you got only 29 more pop culture refences to find.

How about the Rawhide reference?

"No need to understand them.  Just rope em, tie and brand em.."

> [{quoted}](name=WAAARGHbobo,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=KGFVnJeu,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-07-26T03:45:27.271+0000)
>
> Yep!   Well spotted.   Now you got only 29 more pop culture refences to find.

Thank you! I hope a Rioter comments on my Warwick rework concept to. :o I'm going to re-listen to the Kled voice again. I'll make a post seeing if I can spot all the references.
